sentences.en: A cancer is a malignant growth.

sentences.cn: 亚历山大受到恶意的诽谤.

sentences.en: Approximately one third of all patients with malignant disease have hepatic metastasis.
sentences.cn: 在有恶性病变的全部病人中,大约1/3有肝转移.

sentences.en: But the general aspect of the swamp was malignant.
sentences.cn: 但是,这片沼泽地总的来看是其貌不善的.

sentences.en: Cancer, as one the common malignant diseases, has high cancer mortality.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤是一种常见的恶性疾病 、 病死率很高,化疗是主要治疗方法.

sentences.en: Have you no regard for true merit, you malignant fellow?
sentences.cn: 你就不能尊重真正的品德吗, 你这个坏东西?

sentences.en: He deals with the crumbling old house and the malignant Pyncheons as novelist rather than allegorist.
sentences.cn: 他是用小说家而非寓言家的笔法去描写那座倾颓的老屋和狠心的品奇昂一家.

sentences.en: He started to his feet with a malignant glance at Winston.
sentences.cn: 他爬了起来,不高兴地看了温斯顿一眼.

sentences.en: He was died of a malignant tumour.
Objective To discuss the pathogenesis and treatment choices of miotic - induced malignant glaucoma.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨“恶性青光眼”的非手术诱发因素、发病机制及其治疗的选择.

sentences.en: Only fragmentary information on pathogenesis of bovine malignant catarrhal fever is availible.
sentences.cn: 关于牛恶性卡他热的病理发生,仅能获得一些零星的资料.

sentences.en: She developed a malignant tumour in her breast.
sentences.cn: 她的乳房长了个恶性肿瘤。

sentences.en: The cancer is a kind of malignant tumour.
The destructive and malignant neoplasms of chorionic epithelium often arise from hydatidiform moles.
sentences.cn: 破坏性和恶性的绒毛膜上皮癌往往是葡萄胎所引起.

sentences.en: This fact will be alone sufficient to silence the tongues of malignant calumniators.
sentences.cn: 单凭这件事,就足以封住恶意中伤的家伙的嘴巴.

words.tran_cn: 恶意的；恶毒的；蓄意的；怀恨的

trans.tran_cn: 恶性的，致命的，恶意的，恶毒的
trans.tran_en: a malignant disease is one such as  cancer  , which can develop in an uncontrolled way and is likely to cause someone’s death
